{{Quote|Darkness falls over [[Khazad-dûm]]. [[Sauron]] and [[Galadriel]] each seek new allies. [[The Stranger]] and [[Harfoots]] encounter a growing threat.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''Where the Stars are Strange''' is the tenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the second episode of the second season and it was released on [[29 August]], [[2024]].
